plot: The director is exposed to fundamental questions: why look for happiness even if it's absurd? Why live after the death of his mother? Why do the housework? What is the meaning of life?
title: Le sens de la vie
plot_es: The director is exposed to fundamental questions: why look for happiness even if it's absurd? Why live after the death of his mother? Why do the housework? What is the meaning of life?
plot_en: The director is exposed to fundamental questions: why look for happiness even if it's absurd? Why live after the death of his mother? Why do the housework? What is the meaning of life?
